reason.signature_drift: Reason: Signature has changed, but docs have not (Signature Drift).
reason.co_evolution: Reason: Both signature and docs have changed (Co-evolution).
reason.doc_content_conflict: Reason: Source code docstring differs from YAML docstring.
reason.dangling_doc: Reason: Documentation exists in YAML but not in code (Dangling Doc).
reason.circular_dependency: Reason: A circular dependency between modules was detected.

relink.label: [F]orce-relink
relink.desc: Force-relink new signature with old docs.

reconcile.label: [R]econcile
reconcile.desc: Accept both changes as the new correct state.

purge.label: [P]urge
purge.desc: Delete this documentation entry from the YAML file.

undo.label: [Z]Undo
undo.desc: Go back to the previous conflict.

summary: Found {count} conflicts. Please review them one by one.
